import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = (props) => { const [cardName, setCardName] = useState(''); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(''); const [cardMonth, setCardMonth] = useState(''); const [cardYear, setCardYear] = useState(''); const [cardCvv, setCardCvv] = useState(''); const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); } const cardNameHandler = (event) => { setCardName(event.target.value); props.cardName(cardName); } return








} export default UserForm;
